snippet: The party’s leader said Joseph J. Lhota was  the only candidate who shared its positions on keeping taxes low and making New York City safe.
abstract: Conservative Party of New York State endorses Republican Joseph J Lhota in New York City mayoral race, all but ensuring that Lhota and his chief rival for the Republican nomination, John A Catsimatidis, will both carry their campaigns into the November general election.
lead_paragraph: The party’s leader said Joseph J. Lhota was  the only candidate who shared its positions on keeping taxes low and making New York City safe.

headline.seo: Conservative Party Endorses Lhota for Mayor
headline.main: Conservative Party Endorses Lhota for Mayor
headline.print_headline: Conservatives Giving Lhota Party’s Spot On the Ballot

keywords.value: Conservative Party of New York State
keywords.name: organizations
